      • ComponentRecord

        public ComponentRecord(java.lang.String tableName,
                       int id,
                       int ownerId,
                       java.lang.String name)
        Initialize a ComponentRecord
        Parameters:
        tableName - The table name.
        id - The record id.
        ownerId - owner id of the record. This will be the bicycle id if the component is a member of a bicycle.
        name - The name of the component.

        public java.lang.String getPath()
